txt.en:
'I think that you have secured the watch-tower, so perhaps now would be a good time to help Guto as well. He told me that he would be making camp not far from here -- to the south-east, I believe.

'Guto means to scout a place on the map you brought us. It would seem the Dragon-clan are amassing there, for all of their tactics seem to branch from it.

'If you find Guto, you may be able to help him thwart the violence of the Dragon-clan.'
'I did not expect to see you here, [placeholder]. I thought you only worked for my grandfather. But perhaps we can actually accomplish something now that you have come to assist me!'
'I hope that you can be of help to Guto. He would be wise not to let his rashness guide him at such times as these.'
Guto has ventured on his own mission to track and hunt the Dragon-clan invaders who seem to be pressing on all sides in Trum Dreng.
Guto has made camp south-east of the watch-tower in Trum Dreng.\n\nYou should seek out Guto and help him track the Dragon-clan chieftain who has stirred up so much trouble.
